title: Goal Setting: Tools and Tips to Achieve Your Goals
headline: Study tools and tips to help you set clear goals, stay motivated, and achieve your goals with this free online course.
description: Goal setting is a powerful process for thinking about and planning for your ideal future, and for motivating yourself to turn your vision into reality. This free online course will teach you about goal setting, its significance and how to motivate yourself to reach your goals. Learn all of the most meaningful and practical tips on how to set clear short- and long-term goals as well as the techniques to motivate yourself to achieve them.
courseDescription:
Highly successful business people, top-level athletes, and other achievers all set goals. The process of setting goals helps you choose where you want to go in life. By knowing what you want to achieve, you know where you have to concentrate your efforts. This exciting free online course will introduce you to the benefits of goal setting, the steps involved and process for reaching your goals. You will start by understanding the meaning of a goal, goal setting, the types of goals, and why goals are vital. Discover how to keep a journal and write your notes to help you stay accountable and serve as a reminder of what you need to do. Some resources and techniques are also provided so you can keep yourself motivated. 

The next part of this goal setting guide will help you to raise your self-confidence as you recognize your ability and competence. You will learn how to set clear and specific goals that are achievable, and you will also see some examples of SMART goals. Long- and short-term goals will then be discussed and you will learn the difference between the two, importance and benefits of both as well as the relationship between long-term goals and your life’s purpose. Your dreams and desires can and should be used as powerful motivators and you will cover this theme in detail along with the skills needed to create specific action plans and the steps in implementing these action plans to achieve your goals.

Goal setting is a way to decide what you want to achieve in your life. If you want to succeed, then you need to set goals. Without goals, there can often be a lack of focus and direction. Goal setting not only allows you to take control of your life but also provides you with a benchmark for determining whether you are succeeding. Uncover how to keep yourself accountable and to create and maintain a schedule to realize your goals by enrolling in this easy-to-understand goal setting course.
